p: The highest total phenol content (7.70 mg gallic acid g −1 dry matter (DM)) was recorded in the treatment of (NPKb) + U50%. The treatment of (NPKb) + U50% differed from the other treatments significantly. The treatments of (NPKb) + U50% and (Pb) + U50% increased total phenol content by 84.54% and 56.62% versus the control, respectively (Fig. 6a).
